text: Isengard was the side project of Darkthrone's drummer and poet Fenriz. == Albums == * Vinterskugge (1994) * Høstmørke (1995) * Traditional Doom Cult (2016) * Vårjevndøgn (2020) Category:Norwegian heavy metal bands Category:Black metal bands Category:Folk metal bands Category:Musical groups from Oslo Category:Musical groups established in 1989 Category:1989 establishments in Europe Category:1980s establishments in Norway Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1995 Category:1995 disestablishments in Europe pl:Isengard (grupa muzyczna)
title: Isengard (Norwegian band)
